name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (beydou31)
description:
Modifications Planned:

  • Coherent Levels with some story line to capture attention and invest players.
  • Add new type of Platform/Floor that either breaks if player stays for long or damages player.
  • Some kind of new ability to player, either grappling hook to swing (if feasible) or a wall bounce or a jetpack (for few seconds) or a shield.

Miscellaneous:

  • GUI Changes
  • New Graphical elements such as new enemy, New props etc
